mapper.select: select IF(processresult='0','假警','涉嫌遇险') as processresult,processrecord from pub_alarmprocess where id = #{id}

SELECT id, CONCAT(NAME, ' ', phone) text FROM pub_driver where 1=1
and CONCAT(NAME, ' ', phone) like "%"#{driver}"%"

SELECT id, CONCAT(nickname, ' ', account) text FROM org_user where 1=1 and CONCAT(nickname, ' ',account) is not NULL
and CONCAT(nickname, ' ', account) like "%"#{passenger}"%"

select id,CONCAT( (SELECT pub_dictionary.text FROM pub_dictionary WHERE pub_dictionary.type='车牌省' AND pub_dictionary.`value`= pub_vehicle.platenoprovince AND pub_dictionary.`status`=1), (SELECT pub_dictionary.text FROM pub_dictionary WHERE pub_dictionary.type='车牌市' AND pub_dictionary.`value`= pub_vehicle.platenocity AND pub_dictionary.`status`=1), pub_vehicle.plateno) as text from pub_vehicle where 1=1 and status = 1
and CONCAT( (SELECT pub_dictionary.text FROM pub_dictionary WHERE pub_dictionary.type='车牌省' AND pub_dictionary.`value`= pub_vehicle.platenoprovince AND pub_dictionary.`status`=1), (SELECT pub_dictionary.text FROM pub_dictionary WHERE pub_dictionary.type='车牌市' AND pub_dictionary.`value`= pub_vehicle.platenocity AND pub_dictionary.`status`=1), pub_vehicle.plateno) like "%"#{plateno}"%"
SELECT IFNULL(count(*),0) FROM le_roledataauthority WHERE le_roledataauthority.roleid = #{roleId} AND dynamicid = (select organid from org_order where orderno = #{orderno})
select count(*) from pub_alarmprocess a where a.id = #{id} and a.platformtype = #{platformtype} and a.processstatus = #{processstatus}
